name: RainingArmageddon
description:
A game made from Udemy "BlackThornProd" 's course. Using Unity game engine.

Controlling Player Dodging Hazards falling from sky, Use A D to move. And double tap them to dash. Press W S orX to Attack / Destroy the enermy. But they also have cooldown. Theres a timer recording your best time. Use esc to pause.

Press "FROZEN" button when died to restart the game. Hope you enjoy me and my friend's first game. Good Luck!!!

-Actless Studio 2020
